amendment.description: Amendment deleted funding for the United Nations Population Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 108-206 to strike the Crowley amendment on UNFPA and returns the underlying legislation to a neutral position on UNFPA; and to eliminate the additional $25 million in funding for UNFPA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 211 (Roll no. 362).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Smith (NJ).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 211 (Roll no. 362).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
